RIFT 2.2 Hotfix #9

Message #1 le 2013-4-17 @ 12:17:55 par Braaw:
Quote: RIFT 2.2 Hotfix #9 - 8:00am PST 4/17/13 [NA] - 2:00am GMT 18/4/13 [EU]

GENERAL
* Corrected the delay of your Conquest Point total being updated on login - it no longer waits 60 seconds before updating.
* Crafting: Recipe scrolls for recipes that were previously given from quests can now be sold to vendors (including Recipe: Reinforced Leather). These recipes are currently taught by crafting trainers instead.
* Updates to the ability bar system to reduce the chance of ability buttons vanishing.
* Fixes for server lag issues introduced with the last patch.


ZONES
* Carnival of the Ascended zone events no longer appear in Cape Jule and Pelladane.

ENDLESS ECLIPSE
* Kain - Hard Mode:
- Lowered health of Deathbound Bloodthieves.
- Increased the time between a Deathbound Bloodthief being killed and it self-resurrecting.
- Lowered damage reduction of Call of the Dead to 5%.

STEPPES OF INFINITY
* Craft of Conflict: Added a visible timer to the event.
* Champions of the Firestorm: Added a visible timer to the event. Reduced the number of Rifts to close in Phase 1 to one. Increased the number of Infinity Stones granted from Phase 3 to five.
* Champions of the Firestorm: Slightly reduced the hit points of Thazuls Ra, Bron, and Gar.


SOULS
* Beastmaster: Cutting Ruse, Primal Lucidity: Reduced Power cost.
* Beastmaster: Tearing Slash: Fixed a bug where the ability's damage and its Attack Power contribution was not included in the final damage of the Bleed effect. The base damage of the Bleed effect has been reduced.
* Paladin: Kick: Renamed to Interfere. The tooltip and combat log are still showing the name as Kick.
* Paragon: Calliope's Paragon Crystal: Now instantly deals 8,000 damage when Death Touch is triggered.
* Pyromancer: Flame Rupture: Fixed a multi-stacking issue with this ability.
* Tempest: Delayed Blast: Corrected the tooltip to properly indicate that Delayed Blast lasts 15 seconds and not 1 minute.
* Warlord: Thick of Battle: Fixed a bug where the debuff is being removed when applied by multiple Warlords. The debuff from Thick of Battle should now be stackable.
